title: Trade War Escalation & Market Reaction
itunes:title: Trade War Escalation & Market Reaction
description:
Guests include:

-Cameron Crise, Bloomberg Markets Live Blogger

-Mattie Dupler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union

-Kevin Walling, Democratic Strategist at HG Creative Media

-Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
